mapper.select: select * from ( select pi.*,t.normal_quantity total_sale,t.normal_quantity/7 day_sale from ( select b.item_template_id,sum(b.normal_quantity) normal_quantity from life_pos.pos_item a inner join life_order.order_item_snapshot b on b.item_template_id=a.item_template_id inner join life_order.order_entry c on c.id=b.order_id where c.type in(6,7,8) and b.item_template_id!=0 -- and c.payment_type=1 and c.create_time > DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 7 DAY) and a.passport_id=100005 group by b.item_template_id ) t inner join life_pos.pos_item pi on pi.item_template_id=t.item_template_id and pi.passport_id=100005 ) q where q.repertory < q.day_sale
